alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 1:46PM MST until January 13 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Mud Lake, INL, Craters of the Moon, Idaho Falls, Rexburg, St. Anthony, Victor, Ashton, Tetonia, Driggs, Island Park, Kilgore, Dubois, Spencer, Edie School, Small, Howe, Arco, Mackay, Chilly, Borah Peak, Challis, Clayton, Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, Copper Basin, Hailey, Bellevue, and Picabo. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
